extendedInfo.description: Painting your home made easy. Using just a single touch, see the walls of your home transformed with name brands. Use the camera to see a realistic overlay of paints applied to your walls, to sample the paint before you buy it. The app uses cutting edge technology to paint around objects, preserving shadows and texture while adjusting for lighting conditions to give a realistic impression of what a paint would look like. See it before you buy it. Also, take a picture of anything and instantly find matching colors, which is useful for locating a paint match or finding new inspiration from everyday items. * Realistically change the paint color of your home's walls * Snap a picture and touch the image to get a matching brand color* Browse thousands of paint colors and see them applied to your project * See paint chips and hold them up to your walls * Keep favorites and share them with othersIf you like this version, with one more click you will get access to 47 brands from Benjamin Moore, Behr, Dutch Boy, Sherwin Williams, Valspar, Glidden, Ralph Lauren, Pittsburgh Paints, Pratt & Lambert, or Lowe's in our Paint Harmony app. We regularly visit Home Depot and Lowe's looking for the newest brands and contact paint manufacturers to obtain their most recent colors. Suggest a brand and we will try to find it.

reviews.title: Good start.
reviews.comment: Another paint app that has started on good legs but slightly misses the mark. Easy enough to navigate and straight forward, wider bar is a tad sensitive as you end up off a color completely rathe quickly. Again didn\'t find away to see if two colors worked well together. Over all an ok app with room to improve.
reviews.author: Joshlyn Forsythe

reviews.title: I am done!!
reviews.comment: I just bought another house and the former owner had the kitchen lime green. Thank GOD for this great app!!This has saved me some time. I narrowed my options down and now Im on my way to the Home Depot. Thanks
reviews.author: Miata O. McKay

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Not sure how I stumbled upon this app but im glad I did..it works great...i want to paint my kitchen but everytime I go to lowes I can never decide and those little paint squares dont really help...5 stars!
reviews.author: Lewieville SlugR

reviews.title: Well, I feel stupid...
reviews.comment: I downloaded this ap and now I feel pretty stupid.    I should have known better than to waste my time on an app that only had 6 reviews.  Yes, they were all 5 star reviews.  Another clue?  Perhaps.  I needed to match a color that I have in my home.   I scanned the color just fine.  I was excited to see what paint it would match with as I have my shoes on - ready to go out the door and buy paint.  However, onceI scanned the color, then the ap became utterly useless.  I figured I must have been doing something wrong.  You know...missing a setting or a button.  Something like that.  So, off to the developer\'s website.  I got a fun little message.  Something about \"This is embarrassing...but we can\'t find what you\'re looking for. However, if you would like to download a paid version of our ap, here\'s a link.\"  You scumbags!

reviews.title: What I was looking for!!
reviews.comment: Love this app! Please add a search function for color names or codes :)
reviews.author: Dominika Benjamins

reviews.title: Mind blown
reviews.comment: This app tore open a worm hole in my living room, and pulled me through hundreds of parallel universes. I saw things you could only dream of...
reviews.author: Dan Long

reviews.title: Awesome program!
reviews.comment: Thus is the simplest, best program out there for redecorating or even thinking about redecorating. I like playing with it to see if I\'d like an accent wall or if I\'d like my room a different color. This app is totally worth it.
reviews.author: Amit Kashyap

reviews.title: Great app! Fast and easy to use!
reviews.comment: This app let\'s you transform any room quickly to see what it would look like with a new color on the walls. One of a kind app! Thanks to the developers for sharing.
reviews.author: Toby Ebel

reviews.title: Quite useful
reviews.comment: Easy to use without instruction. I used this app to help a friend envision the color scheme of the new house he bought, and he was so impressed that he downloaded it immediately.  Great integration with real product colour names, too! Made shopping painless. Very professional app!
reviews.author: Heather Downing

reviews.title: Always force closing.
reviews.comment: It\'s crap. Also won\'t let paint more than one wall.
reviews.author: Meghan Martin

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: It took me awhile to find a really good home painting app because I was remodeling the den and couldn\'t find the right color. Finally I could see what it would look like without having to use my imagination. Great idea!
reviews.author: Joel Teply
